Reviews.Title: “The most horrible hotel I've ever been to.”

Reviews.Content: location thats hotel bed uncomfortable tv didnt internet connection slow crashed 15 minutes breakfast poor stayed summer impossible stay day time hot hell impossible window worst staff tough smiled military officers tried explain receptionist unsatisfied hotel uncomfortable bed hot bad internet connection bad breakfast didnt listen refused speak manager hotel thats exactly visit berlin thats stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Basic Basic Basic”
Reviews.Author: menash14
Reviews.Content: stayed week november staff welcoming english wasnt actually town horrific restaurants hotel ok cleaned tidied daily else tv german channels breakfast included pretty stuff week weekend lack free wifi pay 2euro hour 7euro day mind youre coming nice hotel price location pretty mitte people coming visit

Reviews.Title: “Friendly personal”
Reviews.Author: alaska088
Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent transport minutes famous berlin zoo opposite berlin sights succeeded due friendly effective staff especially thank receptionists olga helped visit breakfasts clean

Reviews.Title: “Value Hotel in Central Location”
Reviews.Author: holidaybugSwindon
Reviews.Content: booked hotel 7 day stay stay berlin unexpectedly week cheap chearful thats twin basin shower toliets corridor floor ensuite else using hotel staffed russians sometimes buffet breakfast job rolls day wifi priced visit local cafes free internet overall location value require privacy hostel basic accomodation
